sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import ContentSection from '../../ContentSection/ContentSection'; import './FromAirport.scss'; const FromAirport : React.FC = props => { return (

From airport to city center

The airport is 35 km away from the city center.

From airport to Syntagma (Σύνταγμα) station

Option 1 : Metro

Metro 3 (blue line), 50 min, every 30 min (05′ and 35′), 10€ (or 9€ ?)

Option 2 : Bus X95

Departure is between exits 4 and 5 of arrivals terminal, 40-55 min, every 15-20 min (timetable : here - 19:40, 19:55, 20:10, 20:25, 20:40, 20:55), 6€ (or 5.50€ ?), ticket valid only on the express bus

From Syntagma (Σύνταγμα) station to our Airbnb

Option 1 : Metro

Metro 2 (red line) towards Anthoupoli = ΑΝΘΟΥΠΟΛΗ to Omonia station, 2 stops (Panepistimiou = PMΠΑΝΕΠΙΣΤΗΜΙΟ in the middle), 3 min, exit Panepistimiou, 1.20€ if you took the express bus, included in the metro ticket from airport.

Then walk 10 min.

Option 2 : Walk 25 min

Conclusion

All options take about the same time. Bus + metro will cost 7.20€ / pax. Metro only will cost 10€ / pax.

Aim for metro 20.05, if miss then take the bus and buy a metro ticket in Syntagma.



Taxi costs a flat fare of 38€ (54€ after midnight). There are many other options, but let's focus on these as it's already complicated enough.

); } export default FromAirport;
